activities.name: table_list
activities.description: 정웝이샵 테이블과 적재되는 pg테이블 리스트 ( temp )

query.value:
select b.pg_table_name, a.es_table_name, a.period::int as period
  from cd_ods.tb_jweshop_table_master a
      inner join ( select distinct pg_table_name, es_table_name 
                     from cd_ods.tb_jweshop_table_mapping_master                    
                 ) b                
                on 
                 ( a.es_table_name = b.es_table_name)

select string_agg('{  "source": { "path": "['''||a.es_column_name||''']" }, "sink": {  "name": "'||a.pg_column_name||'", "type": "'||a.objtype||'" } }' ,',') as json
   from (
		  select a.es_column_name , a.pg_column_name , case when b.udt_name = 'numeric' then 'Decimal'
		                                                   else  'String'
		                                                end as objtype                                                                         
		    from cd_ods.tb_jweshop_table_mapping_master as a inner join information_schema.columns b
		                                              on (
		                                                     a.pg_table_name||'_temp' = b.table_name
		                                                 and a.pg_column_name = b.column_name 
		                                                 and b.table_schema ='cd_ods'
		                                                 )       
		   where a.pg_table_name ='@{item().pg_table_name}'
		) a

activities.name: condition
activities.description:
초기 적재 파이프라인 PIP_D_CD_GODOMALL_INIT 호출시 
증분주기값 넘어옴

query.value:
select b.pg_table_name, a.es_table_name, a.period::int as period
  from cd_ods.tb_jweshop_table_master a
      inner join ( select distinct pg_table_name, es_table_name 
                     from cd_ods.tb_jweshop_table_mapping_master                    
                 ) b                
                on 
                 ( a.es_table_name = b.es_table_name)
where @{variables('condition')}

select string_agg('{  "source": { "path": "['''||a.es_column_name||''']" }, "sink": {  "name": "'||a.pg_column_name||'", "type": "'||a.objtype||'" } }' ,',') as json
   from (
		  select a.es_column_name , a.pg_column_name , case when b.udt_name = 'numeric' then 'Decimal'
		                                                   else  'String'
		                                                end as objtype                                                                         
		    from cd_ods.tb_jweshop_table_mapping_master as a inner join information_schema.columns b
		                                              on (
		                                                     a.pg_table_name||'_temp' = b.table_name
		                                                 and a.pg_column_name = b.column_name 
		                                                 and b.table_schema ='cd_ods'
		                                                 )       
		   where a.pg_table_name ='@{item().pg_table_name}'
		) a

activities.name: table_list
activities.description: 정웝이샵 테이블과 적재되는 pg테이블 리스트 ( temp )

query.value:
select b.pg_table_name, a.es_table_name, a.period::int as period
  from cd_ods.tb_jweshop_table_master a
      inner join ( select distinct pg_table_name, es_table_name 
                     from cd_ods.tb_jweshop_table_mapping_master                    
                 ) b                
                on 
                 ( a.es_table_name = b.es_table_name)  
where a.es_table_name ='@{pipeline().parameters.pip_estable}'

select string_agg('{  "source": { "path": "['''||a.es_column_name||''']" }, "sink": {  "name": "'||a.pg_column_name||'", "type": "'||a.objtype||'" } }' ,',') as json

		                                                 and a.pg_column_name = b.column_name 
		                                                 and b.table_schema ='cd_ods'
		                                                 )       
		   where a.pg_table_name ='@{item().pg_table_name}'
		) a

select b.pg_table_name, a.es_table_name, a.period::int as period
  from cd_ods.tb_jweshop_table_master a
      inner join ( select distinct pg_table_name, es_table_name 
                     from cd_ods.tb_jweshop_table_mapping_master
                 ) b                
                on 
                 ( a.es_table_name = b.es_table_name)
where @{variables('condition')}

select string_agg('{  "source": { "path": "['''||a.es_column_name||''']" }, "sink": {  "name": "'||a.pg_column_name||'", "type": "'||a.objtype||'" } }' ,',') as json
   from (
		  select a.es_column_name , a.pg_column_name , case when b.udt_name = 'numeric' then 'Decimal'
		                                                   else  'String'
		                                                end as objtype                                                                         
		    from cd_ods.tb_jweshop_table_mapping_master as a inner join information_schema.columns b
		                                              on (
		                                                     a.pg_table_name||'_temp' = b.table_name
		                                                 and a.pg_column_name = b.column_name 
		                                                 and b.table_schema ='cd_ods'

		   where a.pg_table_name ='@{item().pg_table_name}'

activities.name: set condition
activities.description:
초기 적재 파이프라인 PIP_D_CD_GODOMALL_INIT 호출시 
증분주기값 넘어옴

source.oracleReaderQuery:
SELECT b.* FROM CD_NEIS.BID_DETAIL b
,CD_NEIS.BID_MASTER a
WHERE a.BIDID = b.bidid
AND a.orgtype = 'A'

SELECT b.* FROM CD_NEIS.BID_DETAIL b
,CD_NEIS.BID_MASTER a
WHERE a.BIDID = b.bidid
AND a.orgtype = 'S'

SELECT DISTINCT c.* 
FROM CD_NEIS.BID_DETAIL b
,CD_NEIS.BID_MASTER a
, CD_NEIS.BID_DETAIL_SHEET c
WHERE a.BIDID = b.bidid
AND b.BID_DETAIL_ID = c.BID_DETAIL_ID
AND a.orgtype = 'A'

SELECT c.* FROM CD_NEIS.BID_DETAIL b
,CD_NEIS.BID_MASTER a
, CD_NEIS.BID_DETAIL_SHEET c
WHERE a.BIDID = b.bidid
AND b.BID_DETAIL_ID = c.BID_DETAIL_ID
AND a.orgtype = 'S'

properties.description:
- 초기 적재시, 월별로 모든 파일 Sink
- 증분컬럼이 YYYYMM 형태

oracleReaderQuery.value: @concat('SELECT DISTINCT(', pipeline().parameters.IncCol, ') AS CALMONTH FROM ', pipeline().parameters.SourceSchema, '.', pipeline().parameters.SourceTable)
@concat('SELECT * FROM ', pipeline().parameters.SourceSchema, '.', pipeline().parameters.SourceTable, ' WHERE ', pipeline().parameters.IncCol, ' = ', item().CALMONTH)

- 증분컬럼이 YYYYMM 형태

oracleReaderQuery.value: @concat('SELECT DISTINCT(', pipeline().parameters.IncCol, ') AS CALMONTH FROM ', pipeline().parameters.SourceSchema, '.', pipeline().parameters.SourceTable)
@concat('SELECT * FROM ', pipeline().parameters.SourceSchema, '.', pipeline().parameters.SourceTable, ' WHERE ', pipeline().parameters.IncCol, ' = ', item().CALMONTH)

properties.description:
- 증분 적재시, 전달+현재 달 파일 Delete후 새로 생성
- 증분컬럼이 YYYYMM 형태
- Copy data Current Month > Source > Query 변경 필요
- Copy data Previous Month > Source > Query 변경 필요

- 증분 적재시, 전달+현재 달 파일 Delete후 새로 생성
- 증분컬럼이 YYYYMM 형태
- Copy data Current Month > Source > Query 변경 필요
- Copy data Previous Month > Source > Query 변경 필요

oracleReaderQuery.value:
SELECT c.* FROM CD_NEIS.BID_DETAIL b
,CD_NEIS.BID_MASTER a
, CD_NEIS.ORDER_DETAIL c
WHERE a.BIDID = b.bidid
AND b.bidid = c.bidid
AND b.BID_DETAIL_ID = c.BID_DETAIL_ID
AND a.orgtype = 'A'
AND TRUNC(c.IF_DATE) = TRUNC(SYSDATE)

preCopyScript.value:
truncate table cd_ods.tb_eat_order_detail_temp;

select 1 as ss;

query.value:
INSERT INTO cd_ods.tb_eat_order_detail
(
 order_detail_id          
  ,bid_detail_id            
	,bidid                    
	,docid                    
	,orgname                  
	,sheet                    
	,name                     
	,spec                     
	,unit                     
	,temp_cnt                 
	,comp_div                 
	,prod_cd                  
	,standard                 
	,work_dt                  
	,mapping_cd               
	,productlevel_cd          
	,price_cd                 
	,cnt               
	,chk_prod_id              
	,chk_prod_dt              
	,chk_prod_flag            
	,system_prod_ch_yn      
)
SELECT order_detail_id          
    ,bid_detail_id            
	,bidid                    
	,docid                    
	,orgname                  
	,sheet                    
	,name                     
	,spec                     
	,unit                     
	,temp_cnt                 
	,comp_div                 
	,prod_cd                  
	,standard                 
	,work_dt                  
	,mapping_cd               
	,productlevel_cd          
	,price_cd                 
	,cnt               
	,chk_prod_id              
	,chk_prod_dt              
	,chk_prod_flag            
	,system_prod_ch_yn      
FROM cd_ods.tb_eat_order_detail_TEMP
WHERE bidid NOT IN ( SELECT distinct bidid from cd_ods.tb_eat_order_detail );

select 1 as ss;

oracleReaderQuery.value:
SELECT  
REPLACE(c.ORDER_DETAIL_ID, CHR(0), '') AS ORDER_DETAIL_ID
,REPLACE(c.BID_DETAIL_ID, CHR(0), '') AS BID_DETAIL_ID
,REPLACE(c.BIDID, CHR(0), '') AS BIDID
,REPLACE(c.DOCID, CHR(0), '') AS DOCID
,REPLACE(c.ORGNAME, CHR(0), '') AS ORGNAME
,REPLACE(c.SHEET, CHR(0), '') AS SHEET
,REPLACE(c.NAME, CHR(0), '') AS NAME
,REPLACE(c.SPEC, CHR(0), '') AS SPEC
,REPLACE(c.UNIT, CHR(0), '') AS UNIT
,REPLACE(c.TEMP_CNT, CHR(0), '') AS TEMP_CNT
,REPLACE(c.COMP_DIV, CHR(0), '') AS COMP_DIV
,REPLACE(c.PROD_CD, CHR(0), '') AS PROD_CD
,REPLACE(c.STANDARD, CHR(0), '') AS STANDARD
,REPLACE(c.WORK_DT, CHR(0), '') AS WORK_DT
,REPLACE(c.MAPPING_CD, CHR(0), '') AS MAPPING_CD
,REPLACE(c.PRODUCTLEVEL_CD, CHR(0), '') AS PRODUCTLEVEL_CD
,REPLACE(c.PRICE_CD, CHR(0), '') AS PRICE_CD
,REPLACE(c.CNT, CHR(0), '') AS CNT
,REPLACE(c.CHK_PROD_ID, CHR(0), '') AS CHK_PROD_ID
,REPLACE(c.CHK_PROD_DT, CHR(0), '') AS CHK_PROD_DT
,REPLACE(c.CHK_PROD_FLAG, CHR(0), '') AS CHK_PROD_FLAG
,REPLACE(c.SYSTEM_PROD_CH_YN, CHR(0), '') AS SYSTEM_PROD_CH_YN
,REPLACE(c.IF_DATE, CHR(0), '') AS IF_DATE
FROM CD_NEIS.BID_DETAIL b
,CD_NEIS.BID_MASTER a
, CD_NEIS.ORDER_DETAIL c
WHERE a.BIDID = b.bidid
AND b.BID_DETAIL_ID = c.BID_DETAIL_ID
AND a.orgtype = 'S'
AND TRUNC(c.IF_DATE) = TRUNC(SYSDATE)
